title: SeoProfy Hosts Third NaZahid SEO Meetup, Uniting Global SEO Leaders in Como, Italy
content:
MIAMI, FL, August  7, 2025 (EZ Newswire) -- SeoProfy recently hosted the  third NaZahid SEO Meetup, bringing together the international SEO community for an energizing and insightful event. Far more than a traditional lecture series, the gathering served as a powerful platform for exchanging ideas, sharing knowledge, and forging meaningful professional connections.

With over 190 attendees, including SEO professionals, startup founders, marketers, and investors, the event provided a dynamic environment to explore today’s most pressing industry trends and emerging strategies.

Featured Topics and Speakers

The agenda featured a diverse lineup of industry experts covering practical, forward-looking topics:

Capturing the Energy

The event’s collaborative atmosphere and vibrant discussions left a lasting impact on attendees. To get a glimpse of the experience, watch the official highlight reel on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zJrFnjCvi1c

Gratitude From SeoProfy

The SeoProfy team extends its heartfelt thanks to everyone who participated, shared insights, and helped make the third NaZahid SEO Meetup an unforgettable success.

About SeoProfy

SeoProfy is a professional digital marketing agency specializing in advanced search engine optimization (SEO) strategies. The company serves clients across various industries, providing data-driven solutions that improve organic search performance and digital marketing ROI. For more information, visit seoprofy.com .

About NaZahid

NaZahid began as an online SEO conference and evolved into an in-person event starting in 2023, with its first meetup held in Vienna. On June 13, 2025, the third edition took place in Como, Italy, near the picturesque shores of Lake Como. The event is organized by SeoProfy. As an agency that understands the challenges SEO professionals face, SeoProfy recognizes the value of community, knowledge sharing, and networking opportunities offered by events like NaZahid. For more information, visit nazahid.com .

Media Contact

Support Team +1 407-610-2417 info@seoprofy.com

###

SOURCE: SeoProfy

Copyright 2025 EZ Newswire

See release on EZ Newswire
summary: SeoProfy hosted the third NaZahid SEO Meetup, uniting global SEO leaders in Como, Italy. The event, which included over 190 attendees, included SEO professionals, startup founders, marketers, and investors. The agenda included a diverse lineup of industry experts covering practical, forward-looking topics such as Capturing the Energy and Emerging Strategies. The Seoprofy team expressed their gratitude for the participants and for the value of community, knowledge sharing, and networking opportunities offered by events like Nazahid.
shortSummary: SeoProfy hosted the third NaZahid SEO Meetup in Como, Italy, bringing together global SEO leaders, highlighting industry trends and new strategies for improving search engine optimization.

scraped_sources.text:
We build strategies around areas that are most likely to drive revenue. Our specialists optimize your pages for the most valuable keywords, analyze conversion paths, and make changes to your site that result in more sales, not just traffic.
Finally, an SEO company that delivers results
Meet your new SEO agency
- Recover lost traffic
- Boost organic traffic
- Get more sales
What makes our SEO company different?
-
ROI-first SEO
-
KPI accountability
Every project we take on begins with setting the performance goals. This might include more visits to high-priority pages, more conversions, technical improvement, or all three. We track progress closely and adjust the plan to keep targets within reach.
-
Niche-specialized experts
You’ll work with SEO specialists who already have expertise (and delivered results!) in your industry. Their experience spans SaaS, legal, and ecommerce. This hands-on knowledge helps minimize mistakes and speeds up execution.
-
Data-driven approach
Our projects always start with a full audit and competitor analysis. We review your performance, analyze other websites in your niche, and look at what’s holding back your growth. You then get a plan based on the data at hand.
What niche are you trying to dominate?
Our search engine optimization company has partnered with every type of company under the sun, from fast-growing startups to Fortune 500 and Inc. 5000 companies.
Yet, this doesn’t mean we’re generalists. You’ll be matched with experts who have already helped businesses in your niche and know exactly how search engines work in this particular field.
Instead of constantly investing in paid ads, let’s focus on building a constant flow of organic traffic.
Search traffic that converts into high MRR. Proven strategies for every stage of the SaaS customer journey.
People search for legal help online daily. We’ll make sure your law firm catches their attention first.
Targeted online visibility for your properties. They’ll appear exactly where local buyers are searching. No expensive ads needed.
People want insurance from reliable brands and compare options online. Your company will become a trusted expert in search results.
While crypto markets go up and down, your organic search rankings will stay consistently high (with SeoProfy).
Our SEO services are designed to help your company succeed
Every business faces unique challenges and opportunities in search engine optimization. At SeoProfy, we craft tailored strategies that prioritize sustainable growth, measurable ROI, and long-term success. Our search engine optimization company combines years of experience with advanced tools to deliver results that matter.
No matter your industry or objectives, we’ll help you stand out in search results and turn your website into a powerful growth driver.
Enterprise SEO
Running a large-scale business with thousands of pages? We’ll optimize your entire website and use every opportunity to make you visible in organic search. Convert your scale into search engine success.
Read moreSEO strategy
Good SEO comes from a structured approach, not guesswork. Our search engine optimization agency does extensive research on your business to deliver a custom SEO strategy built for your goals.
Read moreLink Building
Watch respected websites link to yours. We’ll come up with a powerful link-building strategy so that each new backlink adds to your domain authority and search engine rankings.
Read moreInternational SEO
Want to reach users in other countries? Our international digital marketing strategies will ensure your website speaks the right language, both to various audiences and search engines worldwide.
Read moreSEO audit
Get a detailed SEO analysis of your website. Find out what you need to do to take your ranking from “practically nonexistent” to the first page of Google.
Read moreGoogle penalty recovery
Each day’s penalty is a day of lost business. Our SEO agency will figure out what exactly went wrong while helping you recover and come back stronger. ASAP.
Read moreContent writing
We’re here to tell your story the right way. SeoProfy will create content that not only ranks well on Google but also captures the attention of your potential customers.
Read moreSEO consulting
Need clarity on your search strategy? We’ll analyze your site, spot the opportunities, and build a battle-tested plan to increase rankings and leave competitors behind.
Read moreLocal SEO
Own your neighborhood’s search results and catch customers right when they’re looking. We’ll make sure locals find you first when they need what you offer.
Read moreYour global SEO partner
When you hire us, you won’t get a bunch of SEO tasks checked off a list. You’ll get a team that treats your goals like our own.
That means we don’t focus on vanity metrics that only look good in the report. Instead, every decision we make is tied directly to your revenue, backed by data, and built around your business goals.
For the past 12 years, our SEO agency has grown to over 100 specialists and has had projects in more than 45 countries and 15 languages.
In addition to that, we have developed our own tools that provide us with insight into your current performance and help us design even more comprehensive and data-driven strategies.
So, if you want to grow in a local market or expand internationally, we bring both the tech and skills to help you succeed.
Our data-driven SEO process: clear steps, clear results
Unfortunately, there’s no such thing as SEO magic. But our four-step process comes pretty darn close.
Our SEO and digital marketing team has tested it across hundreds of websites and finally cracked the code. It’s systematic and seriously effective, and our numerous five-star reviews have already proven it.
With such a process in place, you, our client, can enjoy clear weekly reports on the progress, quick responses from our team, and peace of mind knowing professionals will handle everything.
Our search engine optimization company analyzes your niche and competitors in detail. We look for growth points and low-hanging fruit. Every decision is backed by data.
Depending on your needs and objectives, we’ll put together a team of SEO experts. Each specializes in a different area to bring their perspective to your search engine success.
Next, we’ll craft a custom SEO roadmap for your business with accurate timelines and measurable targets. Defining the exact steps we need to take to meet your goals.
It’s go time! Once a week, we’ll hop on a sprint call to review how things are progressing. We’ll see what’s working, and adjust what isn’t.
Why clients trust our SEO marketing company
Read more reviewsOn average, our projects run for three years. Clients stay because we deliver value and consistent results through strategies built around their business needs.
We built custom SEO tools for fast and lasting outcomes
Off-the-shelf software can only take you so far. That’s why, after a ton of trial and error, our SEO agency developed a toolset to cover what the tools available on the market were missing.
We use a unique combination of industry-leading software and our own custom-built solutions to ensure you get a killer return on your investment.
Take a peek at the software our professional SEO services company uses (and yup, even created!) to deliver custom results for our clients.
Monitors and analyzes backlinks (to check for links that are costing you traffic)
Helps improve and accelerate search engine optimization in the most efficient way
Expertise backed by experience
If you’re looking for SEO services provided by seasoned professionals, you’re in the right place.
SeoProfy has senior experts in every SEO area, from technical SEO and content creation to link building and international SEO. We’ve been finding practical solutions for the toughest problems for years.
Our approach also works because we keep track of Google updates and are always ready to adjust. Flexibility is one of our best assets. So, while other SEO providers react after their clients’ traffic drops, we spot algorithm patterns and adapt the strategy before changes hit.
No shortcuts, no experiments at your cost. Quality isn’t up for debate! You won’t see any forced keywords or robotic content. Or spam links from sketchy sources.
Just naturally optimize pages that both Google and your visitors will love.
That’s why we deserve to be called a leading SEO company.
Sick of SEO agencies that make empty promises and don’t deliver?
Most of our clients were too until they started working with us.
Because at our SEO agency, we only make promises that we can keep. Book a free consultation to find out if we can get you the results that you’re after.
How we approach SEO
At SeoProfy, we only take on the project when we’re confident you’ll get the results you’re aiming for.
So if you’re looking for an SEO marketing company that consistently delivers, we’re in this for the long haul. Our goal is to establish a long-term relationship with every one of our clients.
And we’re pretty good at it — our clients work with us for at least 1.5-2 years. And some for 10+ years.
If our team and your project are a match, we’ll pull together a digital marketing strategy that’s realistic and achievable.
Oh, and there’s one more thing you should know about us!
We say it like it is. If we can’t meet a deadline, or something isn’t working, we’ll tell you right away. Find out why we’re the best SEO agency for you!
Real results come from realistic strategies and transparent communication.
Seoprofy Team
Been burned by other agencies before? Many of our clients have too
But believe us when we say that our SEO marketing agency isn’t like other agencies. Really. All of our team members are great at what they do and will work together to maximize your website search visibility from every direction.
| Other SEO agencies | Yep, it’s us! |
|---|---|
Make overhyped promises they can’t keep |
Only take on projects if we’re confident we can deliver |
Offer cookie-cutter solutions (leading to meh results) |
Will take the time to understand your unique business, objective, and needs, and then craft a tailor-made, revenue-boosting strategy |
Team members juggle a million different projects at once (allowing more room for missed deadlines… and mistakes) |
Each specialist is devoted to their job, giving your project 110% |
Might not tell you if the current strategy isn’t working… or if a task falls through the cracks |
Will be fully transparent about meeting goals and deadlines (and will be the first to tell you if things don’t go according to plan) |
Care about quick results and quantity over quality |
Cares about your long-term SEO success — and knows that quality traffic beats quantity any day |
Measure success by keyword rankings and organic traffic |
Knows that your ROI is the most important metric at the end of the day |
Feels like a typical vendor-client relationship |
Feels like an extension of your marketing team (totally invested in your success) |
Just take orders (leaving you and your team to handle a lot of the strategy) |
Crafts a results-driven strategy that *works* (see our case studies for proof) |
Take your money and then outsource the project to randos on Upwork |
Runs a thorough vetting process until we come up with specialized experts perfectly tailored to your project |
SEO made interesting: Read these
FAQs about our SEO company
An SEO digital marketing company can help you rank higher in search engine results pages (SERPs) using a combination of tried and true methods. They optimize your website’s technical foundation — improving site speed, mobile performance, and user experience.
On top of that, they create engaging SEO content optimized with relevant keywords and matching your users’ search intent. Plus, they build quality third-party links that make your site look more legit in Google’s eyes.
Overall, the approach includes:
- SEO audits
- Technical site optimization
- Strategic keyword targeting
- Content creation
- Authoritative link building
- Local SEO services
- Regular SEO performance tracking
Our SEO optimization services cover everything you need to rank higher and attract more customers. They include technical SEO, keyword research, content writing, on-page SEO, off-page SEO, and more.
We have experience working with multiple industries and approach them differently. Local and international businesses like law firms, SaaS companies, and healthcare providers require Google Business Profile optimization and local citation building.
Global retail companies need other techniques, like international ecommerce SEO, to reach prospects all over the world.
Our SEO marketing company does it all, including offering Google penalty removal if another Google update has caught you off guard.
The price of our search engine optimization services ranges from $3,000 to $10,000 per month. This covers everything you need to dominate search engine results: website optimization, content creation, link building, detailed tracking, and more.
Your exact investment depends on your goals and the market. More competitive industries or enterprises with multiple web pages may require a bigger budget to succeed. Less competitive ones might need less.
During our consultation, our SEO management company will assess your website and current Google positions, ask what you’re aiming for, and suggest effective SEO services to get there that fit your budget.
For sure! Every business faces its own set of challenges and has different opportunities to succeed. That’s why we don’t favor one-size-fits-all SEO. We’ll analyze your market, goals, and competitors, and only then create a strategy that makes sense just for you.
Our SEO company uses the exact keywords your audience types into Google search, creates content that speaks their language, and works with listings where they spend time. We adapt our tactics based on what’s working, using real data to guide every decision.
On average, our clients start to see initial search engine results from SEO in 4–6 months.
But heads up: If the niche is very competitive, it can take up to 1–2 years.
Every website and strategy is different, so the timeline will depend on a number of factors. Like:
- The age and authority of your site
- The website architecture and design
- Your on-page and off-page optimization
- Any penalties pulling your ranking down
Our professional SEO company finds the best people for the project in-house or on outsource platforms. Quality of execution is thoroughly evaluated by senior in-house professionals.
First, we look for the *right* experts for the project. Then we go through an extensive vetting process. Once we find the right people, we involve them in the project.
We know with certainty that the team we pull together is reliable and experienced and will get our clients the results they expect. However, if we need extra resources to meet your project requirements, we will go above and beyond to find the right expert.
Of course!
Our SEO firm helped clients achieve outstanding results across various industries, with success stories that highlight significant growth in organic traffic, leads, and revenue.
Beyond the numbers, these results translated into business metrics: more leads, sales, and revenue for our clients.
Want to see how we did it? Our SEO company would love to share case studies from various fields we’ve worked with and show you what’s possible with our proven SEO strategies. If you want to see more, you can find our clients’ testimonials on Clutch as well.
No agency can promise you any specific search engine rankings or results. If someone mentions specific guaranteed search engine optimization results, that’s a red flag. Google’s algorithms are always changing, and many factors affect search results that marketers just can’t control.
The right SEO company can promise total transparency and focus on what we can actually control: your website’s technical health, content quality, relevant keywords, genuine backlinks, constant improvements, and more.
What we can offer is a solid strategy that consistently brings in results.
You’ll know exactly what we’re doing, why we’re doing it, and how it’s performing.
Our SEO company focuses on making your business more profitable with search engine optimization. To achieve this, we focus on key performance indicators such as:
- Organic traffic growth in priority GEOs
- Achieving top rankings for the most critical pages
- Increasing the number of conversions or quality leads generated from organic traffic.
We’ll also agree on the best time to send your SEO reports so you can track progress.
Stop wasting money on SEO agencies that overpromise and underdeliver
Book a free consultation to find out why we’re the best SEO company for you and how we can help you (finally) get the SEO results you want.

SeoProfy recently hosted the third NaZahid SEO Meetup, bringing together the international SEO community for an energizing and insightful event. Far more than a traditional lecture series, the gathering served as a powerful platform for exchanging ideas, sharing knowledge, and forging meaningful professional connections.
With over 190 attendees, including SEO professionals, startup founders, marketers, and investors, the event provided a dynamic environment to explore today’s most pressing industry trends and emerging strategies.
Featured Topics and Speakers
The agenda featured a diverse lineup of industry experts covering practical, forward-looking topics:
- Dmytro Bondar – How to Launch Projects That Don’t Shut Down in Six Months
- Victor Karpenko & Illia Cherepynets – Entering New Niches and GEOs With Deep Research
- Bastian Grimm – Digital Experience Beyond Traditional Search
- George Rysak – From SEO Expert to CEO: Launching a Successful Startup
- D. Belianin, S. Dobrev, V. Malakchi, Y. Svyrydiuk – Investment Trends: What Funds Are Looking for Today
- Den Markov – ASO in White and Gray Apps: Cases and Principles
Capturing the Energy
The event’s collaborative atmosphere and vibrant discussions left a lasting impact on attendees. To get a glimpse of the experience, watch the official highlight reel on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zJrFnjCvi1c
Gratitude From SeoProfy
The SeoProfy team extends its heartfelt thanks to everyone who participated, shared insights, and helped make the third NaZahid SEO Meetup an unforgettable success.
About SeoProfy
SeoProfy is a professional digital marketing agency specializing in advanced search engine optimization (SEO) strategies. The company serves clients across various industries, providing data-driven solutions that improve organic search performance and digital marketing ROI. For more information, visit seoprofy.com.
About NaZahid
NaZahid began as an online SEO conference and evolved into an in-person event starting in 2023, with its first meetup held in Vienna. On June 13, 2025, the third edition took place in Como, Italy, near the picturesque shores of Lake Como. The event is organized by SeoProfy. As an agency that understands the challenges SEO professionals face, SeoProfy recognizes the value of community, knowledge sharing, and networking opportunities offered by events like NaZahid. For more information, visit nazahid.com.

argos_summary: SeoProfy hosted the third NaZahid SEO Meetup in Como, Italy, attracting over 190 attendees from the international SEO community, including professionals, startup founders, and investors. The event featured a diverse lineup of speakers discussing key industry trends and strategies, fostering collaboration and knowledge sharing. SeoProfy expressed gratitude to participants for making the meetup a success, highlighting the importance of community in the evolving SEO landscape.
